institution: Human Resources Development Service of Korea
category: Industry-led youth customized training business operation rules/Article 8 (submission and review of business plan)
contents: Article 8 (Submission and review of business plan) ① The business group must submit a business plan for the industry-led training project for the relevant year to the chairman according to the contents announced by the chairman. ② In the business plan submitted pursuant to paragraph 1 The screening criteria for this shall be in accordance with Table 1. ③ If there is a need to adjust the target number of people depending on the region, size, characteristics of each industry, selection period, etc., the Chairman may adjust it through deliberation and resolution by the Deliberation Committee according to the results of the screening. ④ When requesting reconsideration pursuant to Article 13, Paragraph 3 of the Operation Regulations, the Chairman may request the relevant business group to supplement the business plan by setting a deadline. In this case, if the business group fails to submit a supplemented business plan by the deadline set by the chairman without justifiable reasons, the support fund may not be provided, or the support fund may be reduced or postponed and the business plan may be approved.
